text: The 1957/58 NTFL season was the 37th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). Wanderers have won their seventh premiership title while defeating the Nightcliff in the grand final by nine points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | Wanderers | 17.9 (111) - 14.18 (102) | Works and Housing (Nightcliff) |} == References == Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1957/58 NTFL season
